about.description_1: Law Consultation "Argus" of the St. Petersburg City Bar Association was established in 1999 and is one of the oldest consultations within the St. Petersburg Bar Chamber.
about.description_2: The consultation received its name in honor of Panoptes - the all-seeing Argus, symbolizing vigilance, unwavering devotion, and the ability to see the truth through any complexity. In turn, our lawyers apply these principles to protect the interests of clients regardless of the case complexity.
about.description_3: Our team of professionals possesses deep knowledge in various areas of law, which allows us to offer clients comprehensive solutions for resolving any legal issues. Today, our specialization covers civil, corporate, investment law, we provide legal assistance both in conducting arbitration and general civil cases of any complexity, and we carry out legal consulting.
about.principle_1_text: we are always attentive to details and never miss important aspects!
about.principle_2_text: the interests of our clients are our main priority!
about.principle_3_text: it is fair that no one should become richer from another's harm
about.director_title: Head of LC "Argus", St. Petersburg City Bar Association, Lawyer, Candidate of Legal Sciences

practices.title: OUR PRACTICES
practices.card_1_text: Argus lawyers solve complex tasks in various areas of law, including corporate disputes, disputes arising in business activities, bankruptcy procedures, including disputes related to bringing controlling persons to subsidiary liability, as well as disputes involving foreign parties.
practices.card_2_text: We provide comprehensive legal consultations and offer unique solutions for developing and improving corporate governance issues, supporting corporate transactions and investments, and other corporate law matters.
practices.card_3_text: Services for structuring and supporting real estate transactions, including judicial and pre-trial support of disputes arising from lease relations, establishment of easements and other contracts related to real estate.
practices.card_4_text: Assistance in registration of inheritance rights in Russia for Russian and foreign citizens, as well as inheritance rights in foreign countries with participation of Russian citizens and foreign nationals.
practices.card_5_text: Legal support of investment projects, development of organizational and corporate structures with investor objectives in mind, creation of specialized financial companies, organization of digital financial assets issuance. Creation of inheritance and personal funds and control over their management, development of mechanisms for protecting property and rights of owners and beneficiaries.
practices.card_6_text: Support of bankruptcy procedures for legal entities on behalf of creditors and debtors, including with investor participation. Disputes on bringing controlling persons to subsidiary liability - directors and participants (founders) of the debtor, other controlling persons, preventing the withdrawal of debtor's assets, providing assistance to creditors in their conflicts with insolvent companies.
practices.card_7_text: Argus shares its knowledge and experience to restore justice and provide legal support to individuals as well as significant social and cultural projects.
